content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":1,"originalJapaneseLine":"奴が連れていた恋人は別の女だったな、やろうとしたがタイミング悪く出来なかった、悔しい思い出だ","translatedEnglishLine":"The lover he brought along was a different woman. I tried to make a move but the timing was bad and I couldn't, a frustrating memory."},{"lineNumber":2,"originalJapaneseLine":"セシルは本当にアリオスの恋人なのか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Is Cecil really Arios's lover...?"},{"lineNumber":3,"originalJapaneseLine":"間違いないと思います、とクルックーか誰か","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm pretty sure, said Krukku or someone."},{"lineNumber":4,"originalJapaneseLine":"勇者アリオス、いくつかの冒険の旅に彼女を作っているとか・・聞きます","translatedEnglishLine":"Hero Arios is said to have had girlfriends on several of his adventures."},{"lineNumber":5,"originalJapaneseLine":"むむ、セシルちゃんみたいのがまだいる訳か・・よし、シィル　メモをしろ","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, so there are still girls like Cecil... Alright, Shiru, take a note."},{"lineNumber":6,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺様の人生目標の追加だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"An addition to my life's goals."},{"lineNumber":7,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アリオスの女を全部寝取る","translatedEnglishLine":"To steal all of Arios's women."},{"lineNumber":8,"originalJapaneseLine":"　身も心もだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Body and soul."},{"lineNumber":9,"originalJapaneseLine":"Ｍランド、ランスの日常","translatedEnglishLine":"M-Land, Rance's daily life."},{"lineNumber":10,"originalJapaneseLine":"マリア、志津香、コパンドン、シィルなど","translatedEnglishLine":"Maria, Shizuka, Copandon, Shiru, and others."},{"lineNumber":11,"originalJapaneseLine":"近所においしいお茶屋さんがあるのいってみる？","translatedEnglishLine":"There's a delicious tea shop nearby, shall we go check it out?"},{"lineNumber":12,"originalJapaneseLine":"そんなランスの上空１万メートルほど上、何かが動いていた","translatedEnglishLine":"About ten thousand meters above Rance, something was moving."},{"lineNumber":13,"originalJapaneseLine":"Ｍランド、茶屋","translatedEnglishLine":"M-Land, tea house."},{"lineNumber":14,"originalJapaneseLine":"前回の作戦は失敗した、次はどうしようかと","translatedEnglishLine":"The last operation failed, so what should we do next?"},{"lineNumber":15,"originalJapaneseLine":"のんびりしていると・・","translatedEnglishLine":"While relaxing..."},{"lineNumber":16,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの肩に上空から赤いレーザー光線が当たる","translatedEnglishLine":"A red laser beam from above hit Rance's shoulder."},{"lineNumber":17,"originalJapaneseLine":"これなんだろう？としていると","translatedEnglishLine":"He wondered, 'What is this?' when suddenly..."},{"lineNumber":18,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラがあぶないと飛び込んできてランスを突き飛ばす","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella rushed in shouting 'Danger!' and shoved Rance away."},{"lineNumber":19,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスのいた場所にレーザーが着弾。","translatedEnglishLine":"The laser struck the spot where Rance had been standing."},{"lineNumber":20,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラの説明で衛星兵器と分かる","translatedEnglishLine":"From Satella's explanation, they understood it was a satellite weapon."},{"lineNumber":21,"originalJapaneseLine":"かなみが上空を見て発見する","translatedEnglishLine":"Kanami looked up and discovered it."},{"lineNumber":22,"originalJapaneseLine":"また狙われる、ターゲットはランス、ロックオンされている","translatedEnglishLine":"They're being targeted again, Rance is the locked-on target."},{"lineNumber":23,"originalJapaneseLine":"あわてて、建物の下につれていかれる","translatedEnglishLine":"Hurriedly, they were taken under a building."},{"lineNumber":24,"originalJapaneseLine":"建物の下にいたらたぶん安全","translatedEnglishLine":"If you're under a building, it's probably safe."},{"lineNumber":25,"originalJapaneseLine":"前にサテラ達も苦労した","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella and the others had struggled with this before."},{"lineNumber":26,"originalJapaneseLine":"衛星兵器について説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Explanation about the satellite weapon."},{"lineNumber":27,"originalJapaneseLine":"はるか高い所にいる、そしてターゲットを決めたらそいつを狙う","translatedEnglishLine":"It is far above, and once it selects a target, it aims at them."},{"lineNumber":28,"originalJapaneseLine":"赤い光があたったら、すぐに攻撃される","translatedEnglishLine":"If the red light hits you, you are immediately attacked."},{"lineNumber":29,"originalJapaneseLine":"赤い光は上空の衛星兵器から発射されているので、どこか影になっている所にいれば安全","translatedEnglishLine":"The red light is fired from the satellite weapon above, so if you stay somewhere in the shade, you're safe."},{"lineNumber":30,"originalJapaneseLine":"試しにランスは外に出てみる、するとすぐに赤い点が自分につく","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance tried going outside, and a red dot immediately appeared on him."},{"lineNumber":31,"originalJapaneseLine":"あわてて建物の影に隠れると","translatedEnglishLine":"He hurriedly hid in the shadow of a building,"},{"lineNumber":32,"originalJapaneseLine":"元いたその場所にレーザーが落ちてきた","translatedEnglishLine":"and a laser struck the spot he had been standing in."},{"lineNumber":33,"originalJapaneseLine":"なるほど・・て、それじゃ俺は外を歩けないじゃないか","translatedEnglishLine":"I see... but then I can't walk outside, can I?"},{"lineNumber":34,"originalJapaneseLine":"ずっとここにいる訳にはいかない、せめてＭランドに戻らないと","translatedEnglishLine":"I can't stay here forever; at least I have to get back to M-Land."},{"lineNumber":35,"originalJapaneseLine":"汎用です、何度か使います","translatedEnglishLine":"This is generic, it will be used several times."},{"lineNumber":36,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの頭に赤い点がつく","translatedEnglishLine":"A red dot appeared on Rance's head."},{"lineNumber":37,"originalJapaneseLine":"やべっと、あわてて飛び退きます","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh no, he hastily jumped back."},{"lineNumber":38,"originalJapaneseLine":"レーザーが落ちてきた","translatedEnglishLine":"A laser came crashing down."},{"lineNumber":39,"originalJapaneseLine":"直撃は避けられたが、ランスを含む数名の仲間が傷をおった","translatedEnglishLine":"A direct hit was avoided, but several comrades including Rance were injured."},{"lineNumber":40,"originalJapaneseLine":"移動中、岩陰に隠れるランス","translatedEnglishLine":"While moving, Rance hid behind a rock."},{"lineNumber":41,"originalJapaneseLine":"むむ、そんな風に定期的に隠れながら進まないといけないとは・・めんどうだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, having to regularly hide like that while advancing... What a hassle."},{"lineNumber":42,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラに聞く","translatedEnglishLine":"He asked Satella."},{"lineNumber":43,"originalJapaneseLine":"そういえば、魔物達同士の戦いでこの衛星兵器を倒したんだよな","translatedEnglishLine":"Come to think of it, they defeated this satellite weapon during a battle between demons, right?"},{"lineNumber":44,"originalJapaneseLine":"　バグを利用した、バグを使えばパイアールのロボットは変になる","translatedEnglishLine":"They used a bug; using the bug made the Pyarl robots malfunction."},{"lineNumber":45,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人メガラスがそのバグを持って、高い所にいる衛星兵器にバグをぶつけた","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon Megarus carried that bug and struck the satellite weapon up high with it."},{"lineNumber":46,"originalJapaneseLine":"　メガラスというのはホルスだな、ホルスなら高い所いけるしな","translatedEnglishLine":"Megarus is a Horus, right? Horus can go to high places."},{"lineNumber":47,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ホルス達に聞くが、あの高さは俺達には無理だ","translatedEnglishLine":"I asked the Horus and others, but that height is impossible for us."},{"lineNumber":48,"originalJapaneseLine":"　サテラ補足、メガラスは魔人だから一般のホルスとは違う","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella adds that Megarus is a demon, so he’s different from an ordinary Horus."},{"lineNumber":49,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そのメガラスももういない、ケイブリスに倒され死んだと聞く","translatedEnglishLine":"I heard that Megarus is gone now, killed by Kavilis."},{"lineNumber":50,"originalJapaneseLine":"　じゃどうするんだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Then what do we do?"},{"lineNumber":51,"originalJapaneseLine":"　わかんない","translatedEnglishLine":"We don't know."},{"lineNumber":52,"originalJapaneseLine":"アウトレンジ攻撃か、こちらの手が届かない遠距離から一方的に攻撃する","translatedEnglishLine":"Outrange attack, attacking unilaterally from a long distance out of our reach."},{"lineNumber":53,"originalJapaneseLine":"完璧だなとミラクルあたり","translatedEnglishLine":"Miracle or someone said, 'Perfect, isn't it?'"},{"lineNumber":54,"originalJapaneseLine":"Ｍランドに戻る","translatedEnglishLine":"Return to M-Land."},{"lineNumber":55,"originalJapaneseLine":"状況を聞いた、コパンドン、セシル","translatedEnglishLine":"Copandon and Cecil heard about the situation."},{"lineNumber":56,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが率いる魔人討伐隊がつねに上空から攻撃にさらされる訳か・・","translatedEnglishLine":"So the demon subjugation squad led by Rance is constantly under attack from above..."},{"lineNumber":57,"originalJapaneseLine":"動けなくなってしまったね","translatedEnglishLine":"They've become unable to move."},{"lineNumber":58,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが動けない＝人類側が魔人に対抗する手段が無いという事か","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance can't move = humanity has no means to oppose the demons."},{"lineNumber":59,"originalJapaneseLine":"これはやばい","translatedEnglishLine":"This is bad."},{"lineNumber":60,"originalJapaneseLine":"if (確認(\"美樹が居る\")==1) 健太郎が居る場合、自分もいるよーというが、無視される","translatedEnglishLine":"if (check(\"Miki is here\") == 1) When Kentaro is present, he says \"I'm here too,\" but is ignored."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴が連れていた恋人は別の女だったな、やろうとしたがタイミング悪く出来なかった、悔しい思い出だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The lover he brought along was a different woman. I tried to make a move but the timing was bad and I couldn't, a frustrating memory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルは本当にアリオスの恋人なのか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is Cecil really Arios's lover...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 間違いないと思います、とクルックーか誰か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm pretty sure, said Krukku or someone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勇者アリオス、いくつかの冒険の旅に彼女を作っているとか・・聞きます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hero Arios is said to have had girlfriends on several of his adventures.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むむ、セシルちゃんみたいのがまだいる訳か・・よし、シィル　メモをしろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, so there are still girls like Cecil... Alright, Shiru, take a note.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様の人生目標の追加だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An addition to my life's goals.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アリオスの女を全部寝取る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To steal all of Arios's women.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 身も心もだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Body and soul.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｍランド、ランスの日常
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: M-Land, Rance's daily life.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリア、志津香、コパンドン、シィルなど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria, Shizuka, Copandon, Shiru, and others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 近所においしいお茶屋さんがあるのいってみる？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's a delicious tea shop nearby, shall we go check it out?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなランスの上空１万メートルほど上、何かが動いていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About ten thousand meters above Rance, something was moving.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｍランド、茶屋
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: M-Land, tea house.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前回の作戦は失敗した、次はどうしようかと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The last operation failed, so what should we do next?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: のんびりしていると・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While relaxing...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの肩に上空から赤いレーザー光線が当たる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A red laser beam from above hit Rance's shoulder.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これなんだろう？としていると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He wondered, 'What is this?' when suddenly...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラがあぶないと飛び込んできてランスを突き飛ばす
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella rushed in shouting 'Danger!' and shoved Rance away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスのいた場所にレーザーが着弾。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The laser struck the spot where Rance had been standing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラの説明で衛星兵器と分かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From Satella's explanation, they understood it was a satellite weapon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなみが上空を見て発見する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami looked up and discovered it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また狙われる、ターゲットはランス、ロックオンされている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're being targeted again, Rance is the locked-on target.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あわてて、建物の下につれていかれる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hurriedly, they were taken under a building.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 建物の下にいたらたぶん安全
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you're under a building, it's probably safe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前にサテラ達も苦労した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella and the others had struggled with this before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 衛星兵器について説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation about the satellite weapon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はるか高い所にいる、そしてターゲットを決めたらそいつを狙う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is far above, and once it selects a target, it aims at them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤い光があたったら、すぐに攻撃される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If the red light hits you, you are immediately attacked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤い光は上空の衛星兵器から発射されているので、どこか影になっている所にいれば安全
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The red light is fired from the satellite weapon above, so if you stay somewhere in the shade, you're safe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 試しにランスは外に出てみる、するとすぐに赤い点が自分につく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance tried going outside, and a red dot immediately appeared on him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あわてて建物の影に隠れると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He hurriedly hid in the shadow of a building,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元いたその場所にレーザーが落ちてきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and a laser struck the spot he had been standing in.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なるほど・・て、それじゃ俺は外を歩けないじゃないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see... but then I can't walk outside, can I?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ずっとここにいる訳にはいかない、せめてＭランドに戻らないと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't stay here forever; at least I have to get back to M-Land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 汎用です、何度か使います
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is generic, it will be used several times.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの頭に赤い点がつく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A red dot appeared on Rance's head.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やべっと、あわてて飛び退きます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh no, he hastily jumped back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レーザーが落ちてきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A laser came crashing down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 直撃は避けられたが、ランスを含む数名の仲間が傷をおった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A direct hit was avoided, but several comrades including Rance were injured.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 移動中、岩陰に隠れるランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While moving, Rance hid behind a rock.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むむ、そんな風に定期的に隠れながら進まないといけないとは・・めんどうだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, having to regularly hide like that while advancing... What a hassle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラに聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He asked Satella.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういえば、魔物達同士の戦いでこの衛星兵器を倒したんだよな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come to think of it, they defeated this satellite weapon during a battle between demons, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バグを利用した、バグを使えばパイアールのロボットは変になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They used a bug; using the bug made the Pyarl robots malfunction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人メガラスがそのバグを持って、高い所にいる衛星兵器にバグをぶつけた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Megarus carried that bug and struck the satellite weapon up high with it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メガラスというのはホルスだな、ホルスなら高い所いけるしな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Megarus is a Horus, right? Horus can go to high places.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホルス達に聞くが、あの高さは俺達には無理だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I asked the Horus and others, but that height is impossible for us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ補足、メガラスは魔人だから一般のホルスとは違う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella adds that Megarus is a demon, so he’s different from an ordinary Horus.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのメガラスももういない、ケイブリスに倒され死んだと聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I heard that Megarus is gone now, killed by Kavilis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃどうするんだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then what do we do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わかんない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We don't know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アウトレンジ攻撃か、こちらの手が届かない遠距離から一方的に攻撃する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Outrange attack, attacking unilaterally from a long distance out of our reach.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 完璧だなとミラクルあたり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miracle or someone said, 'Perfect, isn't it?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｍランドに戻る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Return to M-Land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 状況を聞いた、コパンドン、セシル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Copandon and Cecil heard about the situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが率いる魔人討伐隊がつねに上空から攻撃にさらされる訳か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So the demon subjugation squad led by Rance is constantly under attack from above...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 動けなくなってしまったね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They've become unable to move.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが動けない＝人類側が魔人に対抗する手段が無いという事か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance can't move = humanity has no means to oppose the demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これはやばい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is bad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: if (確認("美樹が居る")==1) 健太郎が居る場合、自分もいるよーというが、無視される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if (check("Miki is here") == 1) When Kentaro is present, he says "I'm here too," but is ignored.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

What a hassle."},{"lineNumber":42,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラに聞く","translatedEnglishLine":"He asked Satella."},{"lineNumber":43,"originalJapaneseLine":"そういえば、魔物達同士の戦いでこの衛星兵器を倒したんだよな","translatedEnglishLine":"Come to think of it, they defeated this satellite weapon during a battle between demons, right?"},{"lineNumber":44,"originalJapaneseLine":"　バグを利用した、バグを使えばパイアールのロボットは変になる","translatedEnglishLine":"They used a bug; using the bug made the Pyarl robots malfunction."},{"lineNumber":45,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人メガラスがそのバグを持って、高い所にいる衛星兵器にバグをぶつけた","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon Megarus carried that bug and struck the satellite weapon up high with it."},{"lineNumber":46,"originalJapaneseLine":"　メガラスというのはホルスだな、ホルスなら高い所いけるしな","translatedEnglishLine":"Megarus is a Horus, right? translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 奴が連れていた恋人は別の女だったな、やろうとしたがタイミング悪く出来なかった、悔しい思い出だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The lover he brought along was a different woman. I tried to make a move but the timing was bad and I couldn't, a frustrating memory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルは本当にアリオスの恋人なのか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is Cecil really Arios's lover...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 間違いないと思います、とクルックーか誰か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm pretty sure, said Krukku or someone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勇者アリオス、いくつかの冒険の旅に彼女を作っているとか・・聞きます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hero Arios is said to have had girlfriends on several of his adventures.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むむ、セシルちゃんみたいのがまだいる訳か・・よし、シィル　メモをしろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, so there are still girls like Cecil... Alright, Shiru, take a note.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様の人生目標の追加だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An addition to my life's goals.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アリオスの女を全部寝取る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To steal all of Arios's women.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 身も心もだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Body and soul.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｍランド、ランスの日常
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: M-Land, Rance's daily life.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリア、志津香、コパンドン、シィルなど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria, Shizuka, Copandon, Shiru, and others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 近所においしいお茶屋さんがあるのいってみる？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's a delicious tea shop nearby, shall we go check it out?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなランスの上空１万メートルほど上、何かが動いていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About ten thousand meters above Rance, something was moving.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｍランド、茶屋
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: M-Land, tea house.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前回の作戦は失敗した、次はどうしようかと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The last operation failed, so what should we do next?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: のんびりしていると・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While relaxing...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの肩に上空から赤いレーザー光線が当たる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A red laser beam from above hit Rance's shoulder.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これなんだろう？としていると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He wondered, 'What is this?' when suddenly...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラがあぶないと飛び込んできてランスを突き飛ばす
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella rushed in shouting 'Danger!' and shoved Rance away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスのいた場所にレーザーが着弾。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The laser struck the spot where Rance had been standing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラの説明で衛星兵器と分かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From Satella's explanation, they understood it was a satellite weapon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなみが上空を見て発見する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami looked up and discovered it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また狙われる、ターゲットはランス、ロックオンされている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're being targeted again, Rance is the locked-on target.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あわてて、建物の下につれていかれる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hurriedly, they were taken under a building.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 建物の下にいたらたぶん安全
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you're under a building, it's probably safe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前にサテラ達も苦労した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella and the others had struggled with this before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 衛星兵器について説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Explanation about the satellite weapon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はるか高い所にいる、そしてターゲットを決めたらそいつを狙う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is far above, and once it selects a target, it aims at them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤い光があたったら、すぐに攻撃される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If the red light hits you, you are immediately attacked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤い光は上空の衛星兵器から発射されているので、どこか影になっている所にいれば安全
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The red light is fired from the satellite weapon above, so if you stay somewhere in the shade, you're safe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 試しにランスは外に出てみる、するとすぐに赤い点が自分につく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance tried going outside, and a red dot immediately appeared on him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あわてて建物の影に隠れると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He hurriedly hid in the shadow of a building,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元いたその場所にレーザーが落ちてきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and a laser struck the spot he had been standing in.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なるほど・・て、それじゃ俺は外を歩けないじゃないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see... but then I can't walk outside, can I?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ずっとここにいる訳にはいかない、せめてＭランドに戻らないと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't stay here forever; at least I have to get back to M-Land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 汎用です、何度か使います
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is generic, it will be used several times.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの頭に赤い点がつく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A red dot appeared on Rance's head.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やべっと、あわてて飛び退きます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh no, he hastily jumped back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レーザーが落ちてきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A laser came crashing down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 直撃は避けられたが、ランスを含む数名の仲間が傷をおった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A direct hit was avoided, but several comrades including Rance were injured.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 移動中、岩陰に隠れるランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While moving, Rance hid behind a rock.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むむ、そんな風に定期的に隠れながら進まないといけないとは・・めんどうだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, having to regularly hide like that while advancing... What a hassle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラに聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He asked Satella.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういえば、魔物達同士の戦いでこの衛星兵器を倒したんだよな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come to think of it, they defeated this satellite weapon during a battle between demons, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バグを利用した、バグを使えばパイアールのロボットは変になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They used a bug; using the bug made the Pyarl robots malfunction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人メガラスがそのバグを持って、高い所にいる衛星兵器にバグをぶつけた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Megarus carried that bug and struck the satellite weapon up high with it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メガラスというのはホルスだな、ホルスなら高い所いけるしな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Megarus is a Horus, right? Horus can go to high places.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホルス達に聞くが、あの高さは俺達には無理だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I asked the Horus and others, but that height is impossible for us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラ補足、メガラスは魔人だから一般のホルスとは違う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella adds that Megarus is a demon, so he’s different from an ordinary Horus.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのメガラスももういない、ケイブリスに倒され死んだと聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I heard that Megarus is gone now, killed by Kavilis.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃどうするんだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then what do we do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わかんない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We don't know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アウトレンジ攻撃か、こちらの手が届かない遠距離から一方的に攻撃する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Outrange attack, attacking unilaterally from a long distance out of our reach.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 完璧だなとミラクルあたり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miracle or someone said, 'Perfect, isn't it?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｍランドに戻る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Return to M-Land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 状況を聞いた、コパンドン、セシル
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Copandon and Cecil heard about the situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが率いる魔人討伐隊がつねに上空から攻撃にさらされる訳か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So the demon subjugation squad led by Rance is constantly under attack from above...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 動けなくなってしまったね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They've become unable to move.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが動けない＝人類側が魔人に対抗する手段が無いという事か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance can't move = humanity has no means to oppose the demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これはやばい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is bad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: if (確認("美樹が居る")==1) 健太郎が居る場合、自分もいるよーというが、無視される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if (check("Miki is here") == 1) When Kentaro is present, he says "I'm here too," but is ignored.
